forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 46F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain transitioning to a few showers late. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
